tooltips.title: Character Sheet
tooltips.description: View your character's stats, equipment, and active effects. Your stats determine your combat effectiveness.

tooltips.title: Inventory
tooltips.description: Manage your items, equipment, and consumables. You have 30 slots available.

tooltips.title: Quest Log
tooltips.description: Track active quests and view available objectives. Complete quests for rewards!

tooltips.title: World Map
tooltips.description: Travel between locations and explore new areas. Each location has different monsters and danger levels.

tooltips.title: Achievements
tooltips.description: Track your accomplishments and unlock rewards. Some achievements grant passive bonuses!

tooltips.title: Character Stats
tooltips.description: Strength increases physical damage. Defense reduces incoming damage. Agility affects dodge and speed. Magic boosts spell damage. Crit Chance increases critical hit likelihood.

tooltips.title: Equipment Slots
tooltips.description: You have 15 equipment slots: Weapon, Off-hand, Head, Chest, Legs, Feet, Hands, Back, Neck, Ring (x2), Trinket (x2), Belt, Shoulders. Each slot provides stat bonuses.

tooltips.title: Item Rarity
tooltips.description: Items come in rarities: Common (gray), Uncommon (green), Rare (blue), Epic (purple), Legendary (orange), Mythic (red). Higher rarity = better stats!

tooltips.title: Combat System
tooltips.description: Combat is turn-based. Use Attack, Abilities, or Items. Watch your HP and use potions when needed. Defeat monsters for XP and loot!

tooltips.title: Status Effects
tooltips.description: Buffs (green) help you. Debuffs (red) harm you. Effects like Poison, Bleeding, and Burning deal damage over time. Buffs like Strength and Haste improve combat.

tooltips.title: Critical Hits
tooltips.description: Critical hits deal 2x damage! Increase your Crit Chance stat to land more crits. Some abilities guarantee critical hits.

tooltips.title: Location Danger
tooltips.description: Locations have danger levels 1-5. Higher danger = stronger monsters and better loot. Match your level to the location danger for best results.

tooltips.title: Biome Types
tooltips.description: Each biome has unique monsters and environmental effects. Fire elementals thrive in volcanic areas. Undead haunt graveyards. Choose locations strategically!

tooltips.title: Quest Categories
tooltips.description: Main quests advance the story. Side quests offer optional content. Bounty quests target specific monsters. Delivery quests require item transport.

tooltips.title: Enchanting System
tooltips.description: Enchant items to add bonuses! Higher rarity enchantments have lower success rates. Failed enchants may destroy items. Use enchanting dust wisely!

tooltips.title: Passive Progression
tooltips.description: Spend Souls and Legacy Points to unlock permanent account-wide bonuses. Passives survive character death! Invest in strength, defense, XP gain, and more.

tooltips.title: Faction Reputation
tooltips.description: Build reputation with factions to unlock unique rewards, merchants, and abilities. Some factions are hostile to each other!

tooltips.title: Raid System
tooltips.description: Team up with other players to defeat powerful bosses! Choose your role: Tank, Healer, or DPS. Coordinate with your team for victory!

tooltips.title: Dungeon Runs
tooltips.description: Dungeons are multi-floor challenges with escalating difficulty. Defeat all monsters and bosses to complete the dungeon. Choose modifiers for extra challenge and rewards!

tooltips.title: Seasonal Content
tooltips.description: Complete seasonal challenges to earn currency and rewards. Climb the leaderboards! Seasons reset periodically with new content.
